item.name: Authentication

request.description:
### âœ… **2\. Login**

- **Method:** `POST`
    
- **URL:** `/api/v1/auth/login`
    
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "email": "johndoe@example.com",
  "password": "Password123"
}

 ```

- **Success (200):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Login successful",
  "data": {
    "accessToken": "abc123xyz"
  }
}

 ```

---

response.name: Login Example

request.description:
### âœ… **3\. Logout**

- **Method:** `GET`
    
- **URL:** `/api/v1/auth/logout`
    
- **Success (200):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "message": "Logout successful"
}

 ```

response.name: Login Example

request.description:
### âœ… **1\. Sign Up**

- **Method:** `POST`
    
- **URL:** `/api/v1/auth/signup`
    
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "fullname": "John Doe",
  "email": "johndoe@example.com",
  "password": "Password123",
  "passwordConfirm": "Password123",
  "country": "USA",
  "phone": "1234567890",
  "phoneCode": "+1"
}

 ```

- **Success (201):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Signup successful! Please verify your email.",
  "user": {
    "id": "12345",
    "fullname": "John Doe",
    "email": "johndoe@example.com"
  }
}

 ```

response.name: Login Example
Forget Password

request.description:
### **Resend Verification Email**

- **Method:** `POST`
    
- **URL:** `/api/v1/auth/resend-verification-email`
    
- **Body (JSON):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "email": "johndoe@example.com"
}

 ```

- **Success (200):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "message": "Verification email sent successfully"
}

 ```

---

response.name: Forget Password
Reset Password

request.description:
## **Get All Users (Admin)**

### **Endpoint:**

`GET /api/users`

### **Response:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "65d9a6e79f4b2a001e4b7a23",
      "fullname": "John Doe",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "role": "user"
    }
  ]
}

 ```

request.description:
## **6\. Update User by ID (Admin)**

### **Endpoint:**

`PATCH /api/users/:id`

### **Request Body:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "fullname": "Admin Updated",
  "role": "admin"
}

 ```

### **Response:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "65d9a6e79f4b2a001e4b7a23",
    "fullname": "Admin Updated",
    "email": "admin@example.com",
    "role": "admin"
  }
}

 ```

request.description:
### **Create Event**

- **URL:** `POST /api/v1/events`
    
- **Auth Required:** âœ… Yes (Bearer Token)
    
- **Body Type:** `application/json`
    

**Request Body Example:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "name": "Tech Conference 2025",
  "description": "A large-scale conference on AI, Web3, and more",
  "category": "Technology",
  "date": "2025-06-20T14:00:00Z",
  "venue": "Silicon Valley Conference Center",
  "price": 49.99,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/event.jpg",
  "createdBy": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
  "tags": ["ai", "web3", "networking"]
}

 ```

**Success Response:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "event_id",
    "name": "Tech Conference 2025",
    "description": "A large-scale conference on AI, Web3, and more",
    "category": "Technology",
    "date": "2025-06-20T14:00:00Z",
    "venue": "Silicon Valley Conference Center",
    "price": 49.99,
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/event.jpg",
    "createdBy": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
    "tags": ["ai", "web3", "networking"],
    "createdAt": "2025-05-11T12:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-11T12:00:00Z"
  }
}

 ```

---

request.description:
### **Get Event by ID**

- **URL:** `GET /api/v1/events/{id}`
    
- **Auth Required:** âœ… Yes (Bearer Token)
    
- **Path Param:** `id` â€” Event ID (string)
    

**Success Response:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "event_id",
    "name": "Tech Conference 2025",
    "description": "A large-scale conference on AI, Web3, and more",
    "category": "Technology",
    "date": "2025-06-20T14:00:00Z",
    "venue": "Silicon Valley Conference Center",
    "price": 49.99,
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/event.jpg",
    "createdBy": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
    "tags": ["ai", "web3", "networking"],
    "createdAt": "2025-05-11T12:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-11T12:00:00Z"
  }
}

 ```

**Error (404 Not Found):**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "fail",
  "message": "Event not found"
}

 ```

request.description:
### **Update Event by ID**

- **URL:** `PATCH /api/v1/events/{id}`
    
- **Auth Required:** âœ… Yes (Bearer Token)
    
- **Path Param:** `id` â€” Event ID (string)
    
- **Body Type:** `application/json`
    

**Request Body Example:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "name": "Updated Conference 2025",
  "price": 59.99
}

 ```

**Success Response:**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "event_id",
    "name": "Updated Conference 2025",
    "price": 59.99,
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-11T12:30:00Z"
    // ... other unchanged fields
  }
}

 ```

**Error (404 Not Found):**

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "fail",
  "message": "Event not found"
}

 ```

---

---

request.description:
### **Create a Booking**

- **URL:** `POST /api/v1/bookings/my`
    
- **Description:** Create a new booking for the logged-in user
    
- **Headers:**
    
    - `Authorization: Bearer`
        
    - `Content-Type: application/json`
        
- **Body:**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "event": "65fa94a3c7e32a1b23f93a8e"
}

 ```

- **Success Response (201):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "65fb1231fae43a2b9b9ab123",
    "user": "65f11231bcd43a1f9b8ab321",
    "event": "65fa94a3c7e32a1b23f93a8e",
    "bookingDate": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "status": "booked",
    "createdAt": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z"
  }
}

 ```

---

request.description:
### **Get All Bookings**

- **URL:** `GET /api/v1/bookings`
    
- **Description:** Get all bookings (admin only)
    
- **Headers:**
    
    - `Authorization: Bearer`
        
- **Query Params:**
    
    - `page`: (optional) default is `1`
        
    - `limit`: (optional) default is `10`
        
- **Example:** `/api/v1/bookings?page=1&limit=5`
    

---

---

request.description:
### **Get Booking by ID**

- **URL:** `GET /api/v1/bookings/{id}`
    
- **Description:** Get a booking by its ID
    
- **Headers:**
    
    - `Authorization: Bearer`
        
- **Success Response (200):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "65fb1231fae43a2b9b9ab123",
    "user": "65f11231bcd43a1f9b8ab321",
    "event": "65fa94a3c7e32a1b23f93a8e",
    "bookingDate": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "status": "booked",
    "createdAt": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z"
  }
}

 ```

- **Error (404):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "fail",
  "message": "Booking not found"
}

 ```

request.description:
### **Update Booking Status**

- **URL:** `PATCH /api/v1/bookings/{id}`
    
- **Description:** Update a bookingâ€™s status (`booked` or `cancelled`)
    
- **Headers:**
    
    - `Authorization: Bearer`
        
    - `Content-Type: application/json`
        
- **Body:**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "cancelled"
}

 ```

- **Success Response (200):**
    

```
jsonCopyEdit{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "65fb1231fae43a2b9b9ab123",
    "user": "65f11231bcd43a1f9b8ab321",
    "event": "65fa94a3c7e32a1b23f93a8e",
    "bookingDate": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "status": "cancelled",
    "createdAt": "2025-05-09T12:30:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-05-10T10:00:00Z"
  }
}

 ```
